ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New, lost, confused, aiyee....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, and welcome to EverQuest! A bit of info first. What race and class? Do you know where you are? Are you looking for litteral directions, or a how to play
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, and welcome to EverQuest!

A bit of info first. What race and class? Do you know
where you are? Are you looking for litteral
directions, or a "how to play this game" guide?

This is a good site to check out -
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/

There are links to just about anything you could need
there, so check it out. :)


--- Jennifer Dury <glitterbat3113@...> wrote:

>
>
> Hey there...
>
> Finally succumbed and bought the "platinum edition"
> (you may all
> laugh derisively now). I'm level 3, and completely
> lost. I'm mainly
> a Runescape player, played D & D in my day (yes, I'm
> an old fart),
> and basically I'm looking for help. I have no idea
> what the merry
> hell I'm doing.
>
> Hi! Hope to meet you all and talk soon...
>
>
> Jennifer
>
>
>
>
>
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

Sarchasm: The gulf between the author of sarcastic wit and the recipient who just doesn't get it.
